transformation.lowercase: This function changes all the letters in a piece of text to small letters.
transformation.math_add: This function takes a number and adds a certain amount to it.
transformation.replace_text: This function changes certain words or phrases in a text to new ones.
transformation.round_number: This function takes a number and makes it simpler by adjusting it to a certain number of decimal places.
transformation.substring: This function takes a piece of text and gives you a specific part of it.
transformation.trim_whitespace: This function removes any extra spaces at the beginning and end of a text.
transformation.uppercase: This function changes all the letters in a piece of text to uppercase.

validation.is_valid_email: This function checks if a given string looks like a valid email address.
validation.min_length: This function checks if a given string is long enough.
validation.not_null: The function checks if a given value is not empty or missing.
validation.number_range: This function checks if a given number falls within a specified range.
validation.validate_name_length: This function checks if a name is not too short or too long based on the limits you set.
